name: Pre-Assembly: Towards a Metaphysics of Worlds
description: What do we actually mean by the word “world” in its varied usages across common language (such as “in the real world” or “save the world”), fiction (as in “world-building”), simulation, immersive technologies like VR, generative AI, and technologies of trust, coordination and commitment like blockchains (with and without zero-knowledge mechanisms)? I’ll sketch out some initial thoughts based on writing and thinking I’ve been doing this year, and argue that the common factor is what I call protocol narratives, which can be understood as never-ending stories.

speakers.name: Venkatesh Rao
speakers.bio: Blogger at ribbonfarm. Running Summer of Protocols.
